dmca.title: Google's Caching Becomes Recipe for a C+D
dmca.body:
Sent via Federal Express

June 24, 2004

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Notice of Copyright Infringement by www.joycesfinecooking.com

Dear Sir and/or Madam:

My name is [private]. I am a principal attorney at Hamilton Brook Smith & Reynolds, P.C. We are intellectual property attorneys who represent [private] of [private], Hudson, Masschusetts 01749 ([private]).

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
